programme.title: Breakthrough

programme.title: In The Shadows With Jason Bellini
programme.desc: Haiti's capital is collapsing under gang control. Families are fleeing massacres. Journalists are hunted. Aid routes are blocked. In the north, one last city struggles to hold the line. Jason Bellini goes inside the collapse.

programme.desc: The human toll as Haiti's paramilitary gangs use automatic weapons, child soldiers and sexual violence to terrorize.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Middle aged men fall victim to a killer in Florida who executes them and disposes of their dead bodies in random wooded areas until a bloody handprint leads to her capture.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A mentally unstable man kills and wounds victims on a on a two-hour shooting spree before trying to rob a tanning salon where an iron-willed customer takes him on.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Law enforcement spends nearly two years trying to hunt down a gunman who tried to take out an entire family one by one as they entered their house.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The savage murder of a rabbi's wife is passed off as a robbery gone wrong, but years later, a co-conspirator's confession helps bring the truth to the surface.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: The murder of a husband and his pregnant wife leaving a child birthing class leaves police thinking it was a random shooting until they find the real perpetrator weeks later.
